Then, the black screen with pink text asking about distinctions among uncreative writing/reappropriation/recycling/plagiarism, which corresponds to moment 4. Finally, the speaker clarifies that pastiche or taking a line "from here or there" is not part of uncreative writing, which fits with moment 5.
